content: here is my messenger bag crocheted using recycled plastic bags i am tempted to call this my ultimate recycled bag because it is so big and could be used for so many different purposes this was a fun and challenging project as it fulfilled a request i had received awhile back someone asked me to make a bag big enough to hold a scrapbook album well i think this recycled bag would work wonderfully to hold your scrapbooking projects along with extra supplies i added a plastic canvas sheet to the bottom of my bag to provide more stability i just placed it inside rolled over at the center in the base of the messenger bag
